recipesJson.name: Mega Fruit Smoothie | Developed
recipesJson.author: Developed
recipesJson.description:
This is a collaborative creation by DEVELOPED: Skiddlz, AlfredPudding, Max Savage, Graham, folkart, and ID10-T . 
This recipe is our representation of a Mega Fruit Smoothie, if only it were a real thing... Full Development Notes on DEVELOPED Ep. 11 https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=JFhphLM7VUg
Our weekly episodes will be released at 6:00pm EST every Tuesday, and catch our live shows every Thursday at 6pm EST https://www.youtube.com/c/developedDIY

reviews.text: Fuck yes. I like this recipe almost as much as the Dr. Phil & Jesus: A Love Story video.

This is a great mix, showcasing the perfect pairing of WF Papaya and VT Persian Lime. VT Yogurt Drink is a great flavor, but for me, at 4% it was overpowering the mix, making it harsh and muting the other flavors, even after a 2 week steep. I mixed it again with 1% VT Yogurt Drink and I think it's more balanced, letting the papaya and lime really shine. Thank you Developed, for both a great show and great recipes!
